page.title: 06LOWER BARN FARM
page.content:
{Lower Barn Farm}is a pig farm and it is the smallest in the district.Mr Tom Potter owns the farm and his son Steven will take it over when he retires. The farm is set on a peaceful road.It is about 118 acres, with 8 fields. Steven was brought up on the farm and thinks his way of life is the best. Mr Tom Potter's father, Charles owned the farm before him. Drainage has improved the fields. Steven thinks the next few years will get better.
He lives quite near the old railway and likes living there. It was dismantled in 1945. He farms here because the building is adapted to pigs. 7 1/2 of the 8 fields are crops and the rest is grassland. Stephen and his family shop at ASDA in S.Woodham.
